headline: VZ Upgrades Network System of a NHL Venue: Will it Fuel Revenues?
summary: Verizon deploys advanced Wi-Fi at the St. Louis Blues' Enterprise Center, aiming to boost fan experience and offset Business segment softness.

headline: Is Verizon Communications (VZ) a Great Value Stock Right Now?
summary: Here at Zacks, our focus is on the proven Zacks Rank system, which emphasizes earnings estimates and estimate revisions to find great stocks. Nevertheless, we are always paying attention to the latest value, growth, and momentum trends to underscore strong picks.

headline: The City of Buffalo partners with Verizon Business to advance public safety communications
summary: BUFFALO, N.Y., Sept. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In a move to enhance efficiency and effectiveness in serving the community, the City of Buffalo, New York, the Buffalo Police Department (BPD) and Verizon Business today announced a deal that will deliver city employees and police officers a comprehensive communications upgrade. For the residents of Buffalo, this upgrade of a full suite of advanced communications tools helps ensure their local government and police department have what they need

headline: How Verizon’s Enterprise Center Network Upgrade with Extreme Networks Shapes Its Growth Narrative (VZ)
summary: The St. Louis Blues announced that Verizon Business, in partnership with Extreme Networks, completed a major converged network solution upgrade at Enterprise Center to deliver ultra-fast, secure, and reliable connectivity for fans, athletes, and staff for the 2025-26 hockey season. This move highlights Verizon's expanding influence in enterprise connectivity and reinforces its position as the official 5G provider for premier venues, reflecting a broader push into high-performance...
